alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Otsego County through 730 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Springfield to Elk Creek. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Middlefield, Maryland, Westville, Springfield, Westford, Cherry Valley, Bowerstown, Elk Creek and Schenevus. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 18 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
